import { Component, Inject, Injectable} from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'category-data', templateUrl: './category.component.html' }) @Injectable({ providedIn: 'root' }) export class CategoryComponent{ public categories: Category[] = []; private baseUrl: string = ""; http: HttpClient; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { this.baseUrl = baseUrl; this.http = http; this.getCategory(); } public getCategory() { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'Category').subscribe(result => { this.categories = result; console.log(this.categories); }, error => console.error(error)); } deleteCategory(id: number) { console.log("Operation Delete! " + id); return this.http.delete(this.baseUrl + 'Category/' + id).subscribe(result => { console.log("ConsoleLOG"+result); }); } public addCategory() { console.log("Operation Add! "); } public refreshCategory() { console.log("Operation refr! "); } } interface Category { id: number; name: string; }
